body_html: @vishwakftw yeah I consulted @rafaelvalle on what we should add, and he suggest that we add this one along the others we already have. I don't think that we want to add all window fns. Just these common ones should be sufficient. I'm not an expert in this area though, so feel free to correct me if I'm missing some important window fn!
